dialogues.text: Finally, we're almost ready!
We've added more variety to the dishes, and our little house has become even more beautiful!
Phew... Phew... This should be enough, right?
Yes, Seele, thank you for your hard work.
We've made so many delicious dishes. It will definitely surprise everyone!
Let me think, oh right, if we add some cute desserts, it will be even more lavish!
Hey, I'm telling you, take a break.
It's alright. Just picture the look on their faces when they taste the dishes. I'm fully driven!
Heh, the same old Seele. You never change.
Huh? Why are you saying that out of the blue...
You always focus on making others happy but often forget about yourself.
For parties like this, you should consider what you like best and how much time and energy you can put in first.
Or maybe, you can make some of your favorite dishes.
Haha, so we're both the same old Seele.
Or you can say that's just who Seele is, right?
What do you mean?
Because you also care about me in the same way.
... Nonsense.
Even though you're not interested in cooking, you sincerely helped me.
...I-I didn't! Don't make assumptions!
I appreciate your kindness.
Humph, you're getting it all wrong. All I have is a black heart.
You gave me helpful suggestions and did so many things for me...
Oh, really? I was just in the mood at the time.
You can handle the rest on your own.
... But I also tried to make a cake. Without you, I wouldn't know if it tastes good or not...
Humph...
Well, I'll lend you a hand, just so you'll stop pestering me...
Hey, you're getting too close!
Go ahead, try the cake and give me your honest opinion!
I'm just helping you taste the food, not for those guys!
Yeah, I know.
Hmm... The cake is soft and sweet, and the cream is smooth and light...
Hmm... It's still a bit too sweet.
In that case, let's add some caramel sea salt sauce. That should balance out the sweetness!
Or maybe we can garnish it with some tangy strawberries?
Oh, right, that could work too! Thanks, Seele!
... Seele?
What's the matter?
Thank you for enjoying the cake I made.
... You gave me too big of a slice, and I just want to finish it quickly.
Even though I'm not a fan of sweet things like this, it's... well, not bad.
I'll make some improvements to the recipe, and I'm sure you'll like it even more!
Alright... Then I'll be waiting.
